mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product ( T_NO, P_NAME, CG_NAME, P_PRICE, P_CONTENT, M_ID) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT_NO.nextval, #{name}, #{cgName}, #{price}, #{content}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT t_no no , p_name name , p_price price , p_rdate rdate , p_udate udate , m_id userId , p_content content FROM t_product WHERE p_delete = '1' ORDER BY no DESC
